page.title: 12Language
page.content: Our region not only has a strong{ {dialect}which,in the main,drops 'the' and hardens and shortens vowels,but also has many{colloquialisms}which visitors may find difficult to understand. 1,Mend fire.(put coal on the fire) 2,Side table.(clear the table) 3,Stop moidering.(stop fussing) 4,Laiking/playing.(adult not working) 5,Corsy edge.(edge of a pavement) 6,Brussen.(belligerent) 7,'oil.(a place e.g chip 'oil means a fish and chip shop) 8,On club.(claiming sickness benefit) 9,'appen.(perhaps) 10,Laid in.(overslept) 11,Badly.(ill) 12,Mulluck.(a mess) 13,Gobstruck.(lost for words) 14,Put wood int 'oil.(close the door)
